location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of William Bruce's communication to Gideon Colquhoun (see f. 33-33v) of the same date. It notes that William Bruce hopes that the Bombay Government will approve of his detention of the Barabara Pattamaiand of his measures to send packets to Bussora [Basra] overland.
